Reviews.Title: “Nice”
Reviews.Author: Jma0504
Reviews.Content: travelled wife son 5 stayed 2 nights location excellent 200 st peters square staff friendly triple pretty nice view st peters dome roofs neighbour buildings hotel restoration specially bathrooms charm clean breakfast fine takeaway sandwiches recommend hotel family trips

Reviews.Title: “A bit shabby”
Reviews.Author: JeanandJim16 Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: excellently located hotel past reception bit shabby facing serene inner courtyard collection heating pipes metal fire escapes view whatsoever buildings decor poor cupboards doors shut peeling wallpaper tv decent reception shower tray overflowed couple minutes feel worth city break sleep bed sleep mattered recommend hotel price command

Reviews.Title: “First stay was nice but the second time, not as much”
Reviews.Author: aforeignaffair
Reviews.Content: stayed dec 2010 pleasantly surprised comfortable european read world ambience tv ref beds comfortable bathroom ok impressed located literally vatican 5 minute walk hotel pay wifi access price reasonable service fast opted stay rome oct 2011 despite rate quoted difference 30 euros night disappointed previously paint job noisy night plumbing outside noise hardly sleep lot time breakfast unspectacular breakfast guy reception hardly speak english difficult communicate whats reception hotel communicate language own basis trip rate hotel average

Reviews.Title: “To dinner by the Pope!”
Reviews.Author: William L
Reviews.Content: staff friendly helpful excellent position near vatican steps st peter square quiet easy accessible public transport 64 bus takes centre venice square till main station termini half hour quiet comfortable oldfashioned building rich continental breakfast included price recommend pleasent stay rome

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Emmaus central Rome”
Reviews.Author: StKittsUk
Reviews.Content: chose hotel central columns st peters piazza front door central hotel offered quad building lift probably dates 1920s 306 double bed twin beds clean tidy bedding clean ensuite clean towels furniture decor bit dated lower floors recently refurbished staff friendly helpful lady doing breakfast remembered drank breakfast continental buffet fresh bread yummy meats cheese etc coffee overall hotel met noisy onto street expect centre busy tourist city

Reviews.Title: “Location is great, service is poor”

Reviews.Content: stayed nights hotel trip rome check front desk clerk woman totally unpleasant helpful speak english answering couple tourist type questions encountered reception desk clerks dealt course stay borderline rude helpful typical midpriced european hotel twin bed twins pushed double bed tv desk armoire actual closet stacked suitcases top bathroom shower pounds overweight able shower truly overweight husband barely sideways dropped soap tried retrieve bend forward head pressed shower wall breakfast included price paid 150 euro night pastry meat cheese hard rolls orange juice coffee woman served breakfast coffee self serve coffee brings tray steamed milk unpleasant feel welcome ate silence whispering atmosphere friendly enjoy rome hotel stay restaurant door hotel caffe vittoria nice helpful waiters prices ate times waiter remembered time nice person encountered stay rome okay location amazing walk door cross street walk pedestrian tunnel walk tunnel entering st peters square basilica looming aweinspiring sight dome st peters hotel window wait basilica sistine chapel hours single day worth stopped people selling tours represented pay 45 euro skip line 24 hour tour tour stay closes 430 15 minutes sistine chapel time limit else recommend 48 hour pass air bus tours 110 bus 20 euro takes hour circuit hop onhop stops main sights rome buses arrive various stops 1520 minutes main queue outside st peters square subway euro fine route limited city bus train station bus jammed husband pulled pickpockets hand pocket guy jumped stop bus remotely thief stopped handed numerous police officers standing various corners rome beautiful weather else people rude helpful taxi bus drivers police officers staff store hotel pleasant experience dealing people rome
